argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lfladdcl.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lfladdcl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | lfladdcl.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lfladdcl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lfladdcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 6 |  | lfladdcl.h | |- ( ph -> H e. F ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` W ) e. _V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 11 | 1, 9, 10, 3 | #P_lflf | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> G : ( Base ` W ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 5, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> G : ( Base ` W ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 9, 10, 3 | #P_lflf | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ H e. F ) -> H : ( Base ` W ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 6, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> H : ( Base ` W ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 1 | #P_lmodring | |- ( W e. LMod -> R e. Ring ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ringabl | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Abel ) |
| 17 | 4, 15, 16 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Abel ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` R ) ) ) -> R e. Abel ) |
| 19 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` R ) ) ) -> x e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` R ) ) ) -> y e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 21 | 9, 2 | #P_ablcom | |- ( ( R e. Abel /\ x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) |
| 22 | 18, 19, 20, 21 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` R ) ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) |
| 23 | 8, 12, 14, 22 | #P_caofcom | |- ( ph -> ( G oF .+ H ) = ( H oF .+ G ) ) |
